site.title: srkdesign — graphic designer and front-end developer
site.description: Portfolio of a graphic designer and front-end developer. Responsive website creation: UX/UI design, coding, React, JavaScript, WordPress, Elementor.

designer.title: My Design Philosophy
designer.description: Design is, first and foremost, not about a “pretty picture,” but about delivering information to the audience in the clearest and most convenient way for them. As the saying goes: “Good design is obvious. Great design is invisible.” From my point of view, great design is the intersection of three elements: aesthetics, usability, and technical execution.

developer.title: Approach to Technical Implementation
developer.description: A beautiful design that cannot be implemented is of little use. That’s why designers should know at least some code, so they can create designs that are easy to bring to life in development.

author.title: The Importance of Sharing Knowledge
author.description: My journey into design started with YouTube tutorials. As a way to give back to those creators, I share free educational content in the form of videos and articles.
